title: Can Voice Chat not be active by default?
body: I literally just hear my friend who I though was a girl was actually a dude. I didn't say anything tho...

replies.body: As a former advocate for in game voice chat who has joined linked discords...I am ZERO desire to voice chat with you randos.

>I literally just hear my friend who I though was a girl was actually a dude

Welcome to the internet.
